content.raw:
I think it would be more clear to me if the folder structure was like the following:

~~~
tpesim-plugin/
tpesim-plugin/CMakeLists.txt
tpesim-plugin/include/ignition/physics/tpesim-features/World.hh
tpesim-plugin/src/*
tpesim-plugin/tpesim/include/ignition/physics/tpesim/*
tpesim-plugin/tpesim/src/*
~~~

I know this differs from the folder structure of dartsim, but it seems more clear to me. I'm not sure if we would be able to restructure the dartsim folder in a similar way without changing cmake component / target names.

cc @{557058:67759e29-d1df-465f-868d-047738e36fc9}
